Package it.uninsubria.server.util

Class InputValidator

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.server.util.InputValidator
public class InputValidator extends Object
Utility class for input validation across the Book Recommender system. Provides comprehensive validation methods for user inputs, ensuring data integrity and security.

This class includes validation for:

  • User registration data (email, password, fiscal code)
  • Book information
  • Library data
  • Review content

All validation methods return boolean values and throw ValidationException on failure.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Book Recommender Team

      public static void validateUserRegistration(User user) throws ValidationException

      Throws:
      ValidationException - if any validation check fails

      public static void validateCodiceFiscale(String cf) throws ValidationException
